name: Phantom Chess
description:
Fight with dreams and nightmares in this automated chess game. Place the units on the field and watch them fight for good and bad! Plan your strategy carefully. How far can you get?

How to play:
- Buy units in the shop using your gold

- Enhance units by collecting three of a kind

- Click on units on the bench and move them to your side of the field to place them 

- WATCH OUT: If you have 0 units on the field you lose


Hints:

Click on the "i" icon on the top right for hints!
